backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profiles and customer inquiries with authorization checks and admin-only inquiry retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and tests associated with branding, marketing copy, SEO, and product content updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including layout, pages, hooks, content, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and dark mode tokens for background, text, and UI colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file setting the Makana Man page title and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining routes for all public pages and the admin inquiries page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Authorization wrapper that checks authentication and admin role before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Customer contact form submitting inquiries with validation, success indicators, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout with header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation links, and login button for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/content/packets.ts: Exports a Packet interface and static packet data used for product listings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for creating, storing, and managing Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, role, inquiries, and submitting data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines a custom color palette with light/dark theme variables and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Hooks to set the page title and meta description dynamically.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, feature highlights, and mission section, setting the document title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Admin-only page that loads, sorts, and displays customer inquiries with loading and error states handled.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form and company contact details, setting the page title and providing email, phone, and business hour info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons, setting the document title on load.
frontend/src/pages/PacketsPage.tsx: Lists available snack packets using card components and provides navigation to contact for inquiries or custom orders.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query-string routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, fonts, container settings, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining versioning, website goals, existing features, and requirements for building the Makana Man marketing site and backend inquiry handling.
